about_the_game:
💟 Story 💟

It all started with a simple offer — to help your neighbor, the aspiring streamer Kaname, achieve success. However, the further you go down this path, the more you begin to realize that her dream of fame requires much more than just charm and a camera.

Kaname is a girl with many secrets hidden behind her on-screen persona. In real life, she’s modest and shy, but in front of the camera, she transforms into a star, willing to take bold steps to capture the attention and recognition of her audience. With each passing day, you help her push boundaries, suggesting new stream formats that become increasingly explicit and provocative.

Your actions and decisions affect Kaname’s career as well as your relationship. Are you ready to help her soar to the peak of popularity, or will you stop her halfway?

Can you lead Kaname to success and help her gain the recognition and fame she’s always dreamed of? Or will this path prove too difficult for both of you?

💟 Core Gameplay 💟

Stream Management: Take part in managing the daily life of a streamer—choose stream topics, actively monitor chat during broadcasts, block haters, and engage in exciting mini-games to boost audience engagement. Track Kaname’s success in real time!

Social Media: Manage Kaname’s social media page by selecting appealing photos to attract followers and increase her popularity. Respond to comments and interact with her growing audience.

Outfit Purchase: Spice up the streams by purchasing sexy outfits for Kaname, which can be used to create more provocative content and drive up viewership.

State Management: Keep an eye on Kaname’s fatigue, mood, and sensuality levels to balance her life between her career and personal needs.

💟 Game Features 💟

Interactive Character Development: Choose how Kaname will progress in the streaming world—from simple shows to more provocative broadcasts, influencing her popularity and personal growth.

Relationships and Emotions: Your actions directly impact your relationship with Kaname—you can either grow closer to her or push her away through your decisions.

Everyday Streamer Life: Take care of Kaname, help her cope with challenges, and support her as she seeks her place in the spotlight.

Interactive Scenes and CG: Enjoy beautifully animated scenes that reflect both Kaname’s rise in popularity and the evolution of her personal life with you.
